product.title: Hand Soap Duo
product.body_html:
An easy way to cut out plastic waste from any kitchen or bathroom.

Each tablet makes 9 oz of soap in our reusable bottle. Fill with water, drop in the tablet and start washing!

2 Signature Glass Bottles
6 Foaming Hand Soap Tablets
Iris Agave, Perrine Lemon, Lavender Eucalyptus Scents (2 of Each)
product.tags: bundle, perennial, sinktop, soap, starter set

images.alt: Two glass foaming hand soap bottles against an ombre blue background with 7 unwrapped hand soap tablets to the left of the bottles
Foaming Hand Soap in a reusable glass bottle on white table with foam on hands
Hand dropping  a plastic-free hand soap tablet into reusable glass bottle

image.alt: Two glass foaming hand soap bottles against an ombre blue background with 7 unwrapped hand soap tablets to the left of the bottles

metafields.value: ["Buy the bottle once and just pay $2 for refills","Our tablets are compact and easy to store in bulk","Stop throwing out plastic bottles  and shipping lots of water"]
Save Money and Space, Without the Plastic Waste
Superior foaming hand soap starter set that easily cleans an washes - one tablets make 9oz of hand soap in that comes packaged in compostable materials.
Natural & Non-Toxic Foaming Hand Soap | Blueland

Safe for use around kids, adults, and pets. Not only are our products proven to work, we only make our products from clean ingredients that are safe for you and the planet. Made without any triclosan, parabens, phosphates, ammonia, or VOCs.

Get the must-have plastic-free item for any kitchen or bathroom.

Each tablet makes 9 oz of soap in our reusable bottle. Fill with water, drop in the tablet and start washing!

2 Signature Glass Bottles
6 Foaming Hand Soap Tablets
Iris Agave, Perrine Lemon, Lavender Eucalyptus Scents (2 of Each)

Subscription includes 6 Foaming Hand Soap tablets, delivered at a frequency of your choice. Pause, skip or cancel anytime.
